description: mostly bound brown sketchbook with three pages of writing in German in graphite detached and stored in inside cover; first bound page has writing in purple pencil followed by a blank page and then a drawing in brown ink of two loosely defined sailboats; following approximately 20 pages are blank
inscription: LLC of page with drawing in red pencil, on verso: 55b
markings: stamp ULC on inside cover, blue circle with black lettering: 65 | ULC on inside cover, oval stamp in purple ink: F. Drexler / Papier n. Luxuswaren / München Residenzstr. 18 | Blindstamp back cover middle of page: hexagonal shape with ornate borders around the letter R
medium: Graphite, colored pencil, and brown ink
title: Sketchbook
